QuestData.Title: The World Famous Ring of Blood!
QuestData.Description: Dear Unadulterated Badass,$B$BIf you're reading this, you're exactly the sort of tough-as-nails champ in the making we need down at the Ring of Blood in Nagrand.$B$BYou and two friends are cordially invited to fight for your lives against the toughest creatures this side of Gorgrond. It's positively brutal - and the crowd loves it!$B$BCome talk to me to start your first fight - beat four of the fiercest creatures I've got and you'll get a shot at the champ himself!$B$B-Gurgthock
QuestData.AreaDescription: Become Lord of the Ring at the Ring of Blood in Nagrand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Become Lord of the Ring at the Ring of Blood in Nagrand.
